input.label: Filter OS Type:
input.default: | search [ `nmon_inventory` | search OStype=Solaris | stats count by hostname | fields hostname ]

choice.value: | search [ `nmon_inventory` | search OStype=Solaris | stats count by hostname | fields hostname ]

input.label: Select a Host:
input.populatingSearch: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=CPU_ALL $hostname-prefilter$ | stats count by hostname | dedup hostname | sort hostname $osfilter$

chart.title: CPU Usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" OR type="LPAR" $hostname$ | eval lpar_vpconso=round(((VP_User_PCT+VP_Sys_PCT+VP_Wait_PCT+VP_Idle_PCT)*virtualCPUs/100),2) | eval cpu_pctconso=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | stats values(lpar_vpconso) As lpar_vpconso, values(cpu_pctconso) As cpu_pctconso by _time,hostname | eval conso=if(isnotnull(lpar_vpconso),lpar_vpconso,cpu_pctconso) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR,$hostname$)` max(conso) As "CPU Usage"

chart.title: I/O Per second
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As iosec by _time,hostname | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` max(iosec) As "IO Per sec"

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % by category
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL,$hostname$)` avg(Sys_PCT) As Sys_PCT, avg(User_PCT) As User_PCT, avg(Wait_PCT) As Wait_PCT, avg(Idle_PCT) As Idle_PCT

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % global usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL,$hostname$)` max(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Max Usage", avg(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Avg Usage"

chart.title: TOP, CPU Usage per logical core
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,pct_CPU,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where pct_CPU<=limit | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | eval conso_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(conso_per_core) As conso_per_core by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(conso_per_core) as "CPU Usage per core" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Physical Memory (RSS) Usage per command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,PID,Command,ResSize,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats count(Command) As count, max(ResSize) As ResSize by _time,hostname,Command | eval Phys_Mem_MB=round(((ResSize)/1024),2) | stats sum(Phys_Mem_MB) As Phys_Mem_MB by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Phys_Mem_MB) as "Phys_Memory" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Virtual Memory (SIZE) Usage per command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,PID,Command,Size,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats count(Command) As count, max(Size) As Size by _time,hostname,Command | eval Virt_Mem_MB=round(((Size)/1024),2) | stats sum(Virt_Mem_MB) As Virt_Mem_MB by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Virt_Mem_MB) as "Virt_Memory" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Paging, Sum of page faults
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,Paging,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(Paging) As Paging by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Paging) as "Paging" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Threads per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,Threads,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(Threads) As Threads By _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Threads) as Threads by Command

chart.title: TOP, CharIO (Read/Write system calls) per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,CharIO,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(CharIO) As CharIO By _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(CharIO) as CharIO by Command

chart.title: FILE, Read/Write system calls
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="FILE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=FILE,$hostname$)` max(readch) As readch, max(writech) As writech

chart.title: FILE, Various statistics
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="FILE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=FILE,$hostname$)` max(iget) As iget, max(namei) As namei, max(dirblk) As dirblk

chart.title: PROC, Kernel Threads in run queue and to be paged (RunQueue, Swap-In)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(Runnable) As "RunQueue", max(Swap_in) As "Swap_in"

chart.title: PROC, Context switches and system calls (pswitch, syscall)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(pswitch) As "pswitch/sec", max(syscall) As "syscall/sec"

chart.title: PROC, Fork and Exec system calls (fork, exec)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(fork) As "pswitch/sec", max(exec) As "exec/sec"

chart.title: PROCSOL, Percentage of Time All processes have spent in: (estimation since terminated processes are not accounted)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROCSOL" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROCSOL,$hostname$)` max(USR) As "USR (%time in User Mode)", max(SYS) As "SYS (%time in System Mode)", max(TRP) As "TRP (%time Processing system traps)", max(TFL) As "TFL (%time Processing text page faults)", max(DFL) As "DFL (%time Processing data page faults)", max(LAT) As "LAT (%time Waiting for CPU)"

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Minor faults and major faults
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(minfaults) As minfaults, max(majfaults) As majfaults

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Pages IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgin) As pgin, max(pgout) As pgout

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Pages examined and freed by pageout daemon
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(scans) As scans, max(reclaims) As reclaims

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages paged IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgpgin) As pgpgin, max(pgpgout) As pgpgout

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages swapped IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pswpin) As pswpin, max(pswpout) As pswpout

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages freed by daemon or auto
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgfree) As pgfree

chart.title: MEM, Memory usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval memused=round((memtotal-memfree),0) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` Max(memtotal) As memtotal, Max(memused) As memused

chart.title: MEM, Swap usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval swapused=round((swaptotal-swapfree),0) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` Max(swaptotal) As swaptotal, Max(swapused) As swapused

chart.title: MEMUSE, Cache Hit Ratio (%)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(PCTrcache) As PCT_rcache, max(PCTwcache) As PCT_wcache

chart.title: MEMUSE, System Buffer Accesses
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(lread) As lread, max(lwrite) As lwrite

chart.title: MEMUSE, Transfers using raw (physical) device mechanism
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(pread) As pread, max(pwrite) As pwrite

chart.title: MEMUSE, Transfer of data between system buffers and disk or other block device
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(bread) As bread, max(bwrite) As bwrite

chart.title: DISKBSIZE, Average data transfer size
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBSIZE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As avg_transfer_size by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBSIZE,$hostname$)` max(avg_transfer_size) As avg_transfer_size

chart.title: DISKBUSY, Disk Busy Activity
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBUSY*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As busy_time by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBUSY,$hostname$)` max(busy_time) As busy_time

chart.title: DISKREAD, Disk Read Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKREAD*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As read_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKREAD,$hostname$)` max(read_data_rate) As read_data_rate

chart.title: DISKWRITE, Disk Write Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKWRITE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As write_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKWRITE,$hostname$)` max(write_data_rate) As write_data_rate

chart.title: DISKXFER, Disk I/O Operations per second (IOPS)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As IOPS by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` max(IOPS) As IOPS

chart.title: JFSFILE, Percentage Usage of File-systems
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="JFSFILE" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 useother=f `inline_customspan(type=JFSFILE,$hostname$)` avg(value) As pct_fs_used by device

chart.title: NET - Network Interfaces Activity by Host
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NET" $hostname$ | eval rate=round((value/1000),2) | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NET,$hostname$)` max(rate) As rate by device

chart.title: NETPACKET - Number of read/write packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETPACKET" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NETPACKET,$hostname$)` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: NETERROR - Number of errors packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETERROR" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NETERROR,$hostname$)` max(value) As value by device
